contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Giberville |image = Eglise St Martin Giberville.JPG |image coat of arms = Blason ville fr Giberville (Calvados).svg |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Troarn |INSEE = 14301 |postal code = 14730 |mayor = GÃ©rard Leneveu |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Caen la Mer |longitude = -0.2811 |latitude = 49.1825 |elevation m = 19 |elevation min m = 6 |elevation max m = 36 |area km2 = 5.00 |population = 4771 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Giberville}} '''Giberville''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1793|203 |1800|216 |1806|229 |1821|288 |1831|301 |1841|323 |1846|355 |1851|356 |1856|361 |1861|332 |1866|350 |1872|332 |1876|312 |1881|295 |1886|277 |1891|239 |1896|216 |1901|219 |1906|239 |1911|207 |1921|441 |1926|501 |1931|1744 |1936|1772 |1946|1140 |1954|2454 |1962|2788 |1968|3469 |1975|3560 |1982|4381 |1990|4574 |1999|4606 |2008|4771 }} {{clear-left}} ==International relations== Giberville is twinned with: *[[Murlo]] (Italy) since 2007. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.giberville.fr/ Official site] {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
